code: import logger from"redux-logger";import cartPreviewReducer from'./cartPreview/cartPreviewReducer';import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';import departmentsDataReducer from'./departmentsData/departmentsDataReducer';import orderFormReducer from'./orderForm/orderFormReducer';import{createStore,applyMiddleware,combineReducers}from"redux";var middlewares=[logger,thunkMiddleware];var reducers=combineReducers({cartPreviewReducer:cartPreviewReducer,departmentsDataReducer:departmentsDataReducer,orderFormReducer:orderFormReducer});var store=createStore(reducers,applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares));window.store=store;export default store;
